title: Get Ahrefs at group buy pricing – with zero risk
description: Why suffer all the risks of an Ahrefs group buy account when you can get Ahrefs’ official Starter plan for just $29/month?
content: Rebekah Bek Developing content to help you understand, navigate, and love using Ahrefs. Get the week's best marketing content Email Subscription Subscribe Leave this field empty if you're human: Contents Let’s be honest: Ahrefs group buy accounts may seem like a bargain, offering “full access” at a fraction of the price. But behind the low cost lies a set of significant risks and downsides - with a potential permanent ban topping the list.Here’s what you need to know before diving in.What you get with an Ahrefs group buyLots of risks, really. You might not realize it, but here are all the things that are likely to come bundled with any group buy account:Permanent account bans – Finally got into your account? Be warned: group buys violate our official terms, and we reserve the right to permanently ban such accounts at any moment.Unclear instructions – You never quite know how to activate your account, or what you’re actually getting.No refunds – Many group buys also don’t offer refunds in any form, and explicitly mention this in their terms and conditions.No official support and accountability – When things break (and they will), you’re on your own with no support available.Harsh limitations – Plenty of these group buys implement limitations that are much harsher than the allowances on our official plans.Strange terms and conditions – It’s not uncommon for group buys to request information like your Facebook Profile and Skype ID.Limited access to tools – You’re locked out of some of the most essential Ahrefs tools.That’s just a taster of all the things that could go wrong, especially when you can get something else for the same price…What’s better than an Ahrefs group buy?Why take all the risks above when you can get Ahrefs’ official Starter plan for just $29/month? 😉Our Starter plan gives you a full introduction to Ahrefs’ toolset, with none of the risks and limitations of a group buy account.Fun fact$29/month is actually less than what many group buys are asking. You’ll have access to these Ahrefs tools:SEO DashboardSite ExplorerKeywords Explorer Site AuditRank Tracker Ahrefs SEO ToolbarAlong with:Full privacy and securityOfficial Ahrefs supportRank Tracker accessNew features and updatesHere’s a quick comparison of how the Starter plan stacks up against our free Ahrefs Webmaster Tools offering, and our $129/month Lite plan.¹ Learn more about what actions consume credits² Verified projects are projects that have gone through a verification process to prove you own the website.³ These additional 500 credits can only be spent for URLs within any of the verified projects.How do I sign up for a Starter plan?Follow this link!Sign up for StarterQuestions?If something wasn’t covered in this post, feel free to email me and I’ll do my best to help.
